snippet: A batch of programs related to the heavens and what might or might not be lurking awaits viewers in March.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger observes that several television programs exploring unidentified flying objects await viewers in March.
lead_paragraph: A batch of programs related to the heavens and what might or might not be lurking awaits viewers in March.

headline.print_headline: An Alien March Madness: Is There Life in Space?
headline.seo: Science Channel and NASA in Marathon on Life Beyond Earth
headline.main: An Alien March Madness: Is There Life in Space?
